articles.title: Ukraine: Nuclear plant offline after Russian shelling - CTV News
articles.description: Europe's largest nuclear plant was knocked off Ukraine's electricity grid Monday after its last transmission line was disconnected as a result of a fire caused by Russian shelling, the facility's operator and the UN atomic watchdog said.
articles.content:
KYIV, Ukraine -
